intro: Acnida subnuda, commonly known as the naked acnida, is a species of flowering plant native to parts of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its simple, opposite leaves and small, white or pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in open woodland or grassland habitats. Acnida subnuda is often found in regions with a tropical or subtropical climate.
